events.message: I just received my new headphones and noticed that the left earcup is broken. There are visible cracks and it doesn’t fit properly anymore.
The issue has been identified as a product defect due to the reported broken and cracked earcup on the headphones.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle this case regarding the faulty headphones.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the problem with your headphones. I’m here to help you get this sorted out as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged earcup and confirm when you received the package? This will help us with the claim process.
Sure, I have attached images showing the cracked earcup. I received the headphones two days ago, on the 13th of June.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement pair or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I’d prefer a replacement since I really like this model. Thanks for handling this quickly!
We have processed your replacement order, and it will be shipped within 24 hours. You should receive a tracking number shortly.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement headphones arrived in good condition and are working as expected.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it works perfectly. Thank you for the prompt support!
We’re glad to hear your replacement is working well. We are closing this case now but feel free to reach out anytime.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience.
